discussion_comments.comment_body:
Would be neat to add our [text formatting guidelines](https://meta.discourse.org/t/formatting-text-in-discourse-documentation-and-uis/324637#p-1595275-capitalisation-1) to `CLAUDE.md` so it has our consistent formatting too.

```suggestion
    associated_accounts_by_provider:
      title: "Associated accounts by login method"
      labels:
        provider: Login provider
        no_accounts: "No associated accounts"
        total_users: "Total users"
      description: "Show number of associated accounts grouped by the login provider. Applicable only if you have enabled social login methods."
```
